span.span: A behavior that adds a workflow control endpoint with a fixed configuration to the service host.

summary.span: 固定的工作流程控制相對端點位址。

span.span: The fixed workflow control relative endpoint address.

summary.span: 這個位址會附加至服務的基底位址，以建立控制端點位址。

span.span: This address is appended to the base address of the service to create the control endpoint address.

summary.span: 取得使用 HTTP 通訊協定時，工作流程執行個體控制端點的繫結。

span.span: Gets the binding for the workflow instance control endpoint when the HTTP protocol is used.

value.span: 工作流程執行個體控制端點的繫結。

span.span: The binding for the workflow instance control endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 繫結會自動建立根據設定服務主機的基底位址之通訊協定。The binding is automatically created based on the protocols configured for the service host's base address. 傳送至工作流程執行個體控制端點的訊息不會包含任何可識別個人的資訊，因此不需加密。Messages sent to the workflow instance control endpoint do not contain any personally identifiable information and therefore it need not be encrypted. 傳送至工作流程控制端點的訊息需包含用於授權的使用者識別身分。Messages sent to the workflow control endpoint need to contain the user identity to use for authorization. 啟用 HTTP 通訊協定時， 會搭配下列設定使用。When the HTTP protocol is enabled, the is used with the following settings. 1. 啟用交易流程。Transaction flow is enabled. 2. 安全模式設定為 。Security mode is set to . 3. 使用 Windows 用戶端認證。Windows client credentials are used.

summary.span: 取得使用 net.pipe 通訊協定時，工作流程執行個體控制端點的繫結。

span.span: Gets the binding for the workflow instance control endpoint when the net.pipe protocol is used.

value.span: 工作流程執行個體控制端點的繫結。

span.span: The binding for the workflow instance control endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 繫結會自動建立根據設定服務主機的基底位址之通訊協定。The binding is automatically created based on the protocols configured for the service host's base address. 傳送至工作流程執行個體控制端點的訊息不會包含任何可識別個人的資訊，因此不需加密。Messages sent to the workflow instance control endpoint do not contain any personally identifiable information and therefore it need not be encrypted. 傳送至工作流程控制端點的訊息需包含用於授權的使用者識別身分。Messages sent to the workflow control endpoint need to contain the user identity to use for authorization. 啟用 net.pipe 通訊協定時， 會搭配下列設定使用。When the net.pipe protocol is enabled, the is used with the following settings. 1. 啟用異動流程。Transaction flow is enabled. 2. 安全模式設定為 。Security mode is set to . 3. 傳輸安全層級設定為 。Transport security level is set to . 4. 使用 Windows 用戶端認證。Windows client credentials are used.

summary.span: 取得或設定授權使用工作流程執行個體控制端點的 Windows 使用者群組。

span.span: Gets or sets the Windows group of users authorized to use the workflow instance control endpoint.

value.span: 授權使用工作流程執行個體控制端點的 Windows 使用者群組。

span.span: The Windows group of users authorized to use the workflow instance control endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值為"BUILTIN\Administrators"。Defaults to "BUILTIN\Administrators". 有效的設定為：本機 Windows 群組或 Windows 網域。Valid settings are: a local Windows group or a Windows domain.
